attributes.action: South West Water bills are too high and unfair, we need to be put in line with the national average bill.
attributes.additional_details:
People in the South West of Britain are paying over the cost of the national average (£376) for their water, most, like myself are paying almost 3 times the amount.

A fairer pricing system needs to be adopted nationally. The fact that we have a vast coastline is not reason enough to bill us with such extortionate amounts. Meanwhile SWW are making massive profits.
